testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Navigate to application homepage
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (search bar, buttons, villa cards)
Check for proper navigation structure with working links
Verify application shows BeachStay Villas branding and content
Confirm search functionality is present and interactive
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional BeachStay Villas features with search, villa listings, and navigation
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or generic content, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Homepage Content and Features Test
testCases.description: Test that homepage displays proper BeachStay Villas content and features
steps: Load the homepage at root URL
Verify hero section with beach villa background image
Check for search form with location, dates, and guest inputs
Verify 'Featured Villas' section displays villa cards
Check 'Popular Beach Destinations' section
Verify navigation menu with proper links
Test 'List Your Villa' call-to-action button
testCases.expectedOutcome: Homepage displays complete BeachStay Villas interface with search, featured content, and navigation

testCases.name: Villa Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test the villa search functionality works properly
steps: Enter a location in the search bar (e.g., 'Santa Monica')
Select check-in and check-out dates
Set number of guests
Click the Search button
Verify navigation to search results page
Check that search parameters are preserved
Verify villa results are displayed if available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality works and navigates to results page with proper parameters

testCases.name: Villa Cards Display Test
testCases.description: Test that villa cards display properly with all required information
steps: Navigate to homepage
Locate the 'Featured Villas' section
Verify villa cards display images
Check that each card shows villa title, location, price
Verify bedroom/bathroom/guest count information
Check for rating stars and review counts
Test that villa cards are clickable links
testCases.expectedOutcome: Villa cards display complete information and are interactive

testCases.name: Navigation Menu Test
testCases.description: Test that navigation menu works properly
steps: Check top navigation bar is visible
Verify BeachStay Villas logo/branding
Test login/signup links for unauthenticated users
Check mobile menu functionality on smaller screens
Verify all navigation links are clickable
Test user profile dropdown if authenticated
testCases.expectedOutcome: Navigation menu is functional with proper links and responsive behavior

testCases.name: User Authentication Flow Test
testCases.description: Test user login and signup functionality
steps: Click on 'Login' link in navigation
Verify login form displays with email and password fields
Test form validation with invalid inputs
Click on 'Sign Up' link
Verify signup form displays with required fields
Test guest vs host signup options
Check password reset functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authentication forms display properly with validation and proper flow

testCases.name: Villa Details Page Test
steps: Click on a villa card from homepage or search results
Verify navigation to villa details page
Check villa images, title, and description display
Verify amenities list is shown
Check pricing information and booking form
Test calendar availability display
Verify host information section
testCases.expectedOutcome: Villa details page displays comprehensive information and booking interface

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Test homepage on desktop viewport (1200px+)
Test on tablet viewport (768px-1199px)
Test on mobile viewport (320px-767px)
Verify search form adapts to screen size
Check villa cards layout on different screens
Test navigation menu mobile behavior
Verify text and images scale appropriately
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays properly and remains functional across all screen sizes

testCases.name: Booking Flow Test
steps: Navigate to a villa details page
Select dates and number of guests
Click 'Book Now' or similar booking button
Verify navigation to booking page
Check guest information form
Verify price calculation and summary
Test booking confirmation flow
testCases.expectedOutcome: Booking flow works properly with proper form validation and price calculation

testCases.name: Host Dashboard Test
steps: Navigate to host signup or login as host
Access host dashboard
Verify villa management interface
Check reservation management features
Test villa listing creation/editing
Verify host profile management
Check messaging interface for hosts
testCases.expectedOutcome: Host dashboard provides complete villa and reservation management functionality

testCases.name: Error Handling Test
testCases.description: Test application error handling and 404 pages
steps: Navigate to non-existent URL (e.g., /nonexistent)
Verify 404 page displays properly
Test error states for failed API calls
Check form validation error messages
Test network error handling
Verify error boundaries work properly
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with proper error pages and messages

testCases.name: Performance and Loading Test
testCases.description: Test application loading performance and optimization
steps: Measure initial page load time
Check for loading states during data fetching
Verify images load properly with lazy loading
Test search results loading performance
Check for proper caching of API responses
Verify smooth scrolling and interactions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly with proper loading states and smooth interactions

testCases.name: Data Persistence Test
testCases.description: Test that user data and search state persist properly
steps: Perform a search with specific parameters
Navigate to different pages
Return to search and verify parameters are preserved
Test user session persistence across page refreshes
Check wishlist and booking cart persistence
Verify user preferences are saved
testCases.expectedOutcome: User data and application state persist properly across navigation and sessions

testCases.name: Accessibility Test
steps: Test keyboard navigation throughout the application
Verify proper ARIA labels and roles
Check color contrast ratios
Test screen reader compatibility
Verify form labels and error announcements
Check focus management and visual indicators
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application is accessible with proper keyboard navigation and screen reader support

testCases.name: Frontend-Backend Integration Test
testCases.description: Test that frontend properly integrates with backend API
steps: Verify API calls are made to correct endpoints
Test data fetching for villa listings
Check authentication API integration
Test booking submission to backend
Verify real-time messaging functionality
Check error handling for API failures
testCases.expectedOutcome: Frontend successfully communicates with backend API with proper error handling
